node.title: Madison de Rozario wins maiden New York Marathon
node.alt: Madison de Rozario holds her hand to her mouth draped in a Australia flag
node.description: Madison de Rozario backs up her Tokyo Paralympic marathon victory with a maiden title at the New York Marathon.
node.content:
["Australian Madison de Rozario has won the women's wheelchair race in the New York Marathon, holding off past champions Tatyana McFadden and Manuela Sch\u00e4r for her first Big Apple victory.", "The 27-year-old from Perth also took Gold at this year's Tokyo Paralympic Marathon.", "\"This is unreal,\" said the 27-year-old from Perth, who finished in 1:51:01, almost three minutes ahead of her closest rival\u00a0McFadden.", "\"New York is one that I've never had amazing results on. It's been my least successful event, and my least successful consistently.", "\"But the two years we weren't travelling, we buried ourselves in base work and strength work, and it's paid off, not just here but in Tokyo.\"", "De Rozario had also previously won the London marathon in 2018 and the World Para Athletics Championships event.", "", "
Madison De Rozario crossed three minutes clear of second place.(Getty:\u00a0Elsa)
", "\"I've been wanting to break into this part of my career for three years,\" she said.", "\"The marathon is such a big challenge in terms of how you train for it.", "\"There's such a huge difference between staying with a pack, or getting to the podium or even staying strong throughout the distance.", "Marcel Hug of Switzerland won the men's wheelchair race for the fourth time, finishing more than six-and-a-half minutes ahead of the next racer for his first title since 2017.", "The 35-year-old added yet another prize to a remarkable year, which\u00a0included four Gold medals at the Tokyo Paralympics, including in the marathon.", "He also won the Boston Marathon last month.", "Albert Korir and\u00a0Peres Jepchirchir made it a\u00a0Kenyan sweep in the men's and women's races later in the day.", "", "
Albert Korir completed his New York redemption story.(Getty: Elsa)
", "Korir won the men's race two years after finishing second while Jepchirchir became the only woman to take a marathon major this\u00a0(northern) autumn\u00a0after earning an Olympic Gold medal.", "\"It was fantastic,\"\u00a0Korir said.\u00a0", "Korir overtook Morocco\u2019s Mohamed El Aaraby and Italy\u2019s Eyob Faniel around the 18th mile (29-kilometre mark) and quickly built a lead to remove any possibility of drama. He won in 2:08:22.\u00a0", "\"It was not an easy race,\"\u00a0Korir said. \"But I enjoyed it.\"", "His win was Korir's first victory in one of the World Marathon Majors and his first time atop any podium since winning the Ottawa Race Weekend Marathon in 2019.", "The 27-year-old Korir finished second to Geoffrey Kamworor in 2019 by 23 seconds and didn't race again until this June because of the pandemic.", "El Aaraby held on for an improbable second-place finish after coming in 11th at the Tokyo Olympics. Faniel was third.", "", "
Peres Jepchirchir completed a stellar 2021 season with victory in New York.(Getty: Elsa)
", "Jepchirchir was side by side with countrywoman Viola Cheptoo and Ethiopia's Ababel Yeshaneh from the time they entered the Bronx until they got to the Central Park\u00a0entrance.", "Moments after guzzling two energy gel packets, Jepchirchir turned on the jets and pulled away, winning in 2:22:39 for the third-fastest time by a woman in New York\u00a0Marathon history.", "Jepchirchir, 28, took Gold at the Tokyo Olympics marathon in August and came back on a short recovery to win a race once dominated by her hero, Mary Keitany, a four-time winner in New York who recently retired from the sport.", "Cheptoo finished second in her marathon debut and quickly found her brother, Bernard Lagat, who was broadcasting the race on ESPN. Yeshaneh was third.", "", "
Viola Cheptoo dedicated her second place finish to her murdered compatriot, Agnes Tirop.(Getty: Elsa)
", "She dedicated her second place finish to\u00a0compatriot Agnes Tirop, who was found stabbed to death in her home last month.", "\"It's been really challenging,\" said Cheptoo, who flew home with Tirop from Germany to Kenya.", "\"There were no signs of abuse. because she kept it to herself, and just knowing how she was murdered, the pain that she went through has really affected me.\"", "Tirop had finished fourth in the 5,000m at this year's Tokyo Olympics.", "Cheptoo is among a group of athletes who came together with Tirop's family to form \"Tirop's Angels,\"\u00a0a foundation that aims to raise awareness of violence against women.", "The second-oldest of the world's marathon majors \u2014 this was the\u00a050th running of the race \u2014\u00a0returned after being cancelled\u00a0in 2020 due to the COVID-19 pandemic.", "In a city where over 34,000 have died of COVID-19, organisers hoped for an uplifting celebration akin to the marathon staged two months after the 9/11 attacks.", "The field was shrunk by about 40 per cent this year to help keep runners distanced, and participants had to provide proof of vaccination or a negative COVID-19 test within 48 hours of race day.", "Runners registered for the 2020 race that was wiped out were given the option of a full refund or entry into the 2021, \u201922 or \u201923 races.", "AP/Reuters"]
